Articles.Content:
as you have probably noticed, the addons section has been reorganized... again :

yes well - since the last round of board shuffling, the addons area had become, hmm... 'inconvenient' - for the lack of a better word

hopefully, now i\'ve sorted it out to a configuration that at the very least makes some sense - and i\'ve tried my best to relocate a massive amount of posts to their new respective locations....

logically, there may still be misplaced topics at some of the boards (this will take some time) - and unfortunately, a couple of locked threads may have been mistakenly deleted

i do apologize for that :-[

anyways - i and the rest of the mod team are gonna keep working to make sure all is where it should be, and if any questions, feel free to ask here or in the forum-forum :thumbup:
